metadata.title: USN-5713-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: Devin Jeanpierre discovered that Python incorrectly handled sockets when the multiprocessing module was being used. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code and escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5713-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libpython3.10-minimal - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 idle-python3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-doc - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-minimal - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-examples - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 libpython3.10 - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 libpython3.10-dev - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 libpython3.10-testsuite - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-dev - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 libpython3.10-stdlib - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-venv - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-nopie - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 python3.10-full - 3.10.6-1~22.04.1 No subscription required
